title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager AlertService Type Confusion Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Ivanti Endpoint Manager. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the AlertService. The issue results from an incorrect type cast. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose stored credentials, leading to further compromise.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-EPM-January-2025-for-EPM-2024-and-EPM-2022-SU6
timeline:
2024-10-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-01-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-01-19 - Advisory Updated
credit: Piotr Bazydlo (@chudypb) and Simon Zuckerbraun of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
